about_the_game:
The third season pass for TEKKEN 7 featuring a collection of different downloadable content bundled together at a discounted price!

Includes the following DLC: • DLC10 - Currently available! Features the playable character ""Zafina""! *To use the character in DLC10, you must update the game to version 3.00 or later.

• DLC11 and Beyond
- 3 new playable characters
- an additional game feature
- all-new stage

Season Pass 3 Bonus: Character Customization Items
- Character Customization Sets (include glasses, accessories, hairstyles, facial hair, effects, and auras)
- Player Customization Item Sets (include panels, health bars, and plates)
*Some character customization items cannot be used by certain characters.
detailed_description:
The third season pass for TEKKEN 7 featuring a collection of different downloadable content bundled together at a discounted price!

Includes the following DLC: • DLC10 - Currently available! Features the playable character ""Zafina""! *To use the character in DLC10, you must update the game to version 3.00 or later.

• DLC11 and Beyond
- 3 new playable characters
- an additional game feature
- all-new stage

Season Pass 3 Bonus: Character Customization Items
- Character Customization Sets (include glasses, accessories, hairstyles, facial hair, effects, and auras)
- Player Customization Item Sets (include panels, health bars, and plates)
*Some character customization items cannot be used by certain characters.
name: TEKKEN 7 - Season Pass 3

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4160 @ 3.60GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 2GB, GTX 750Ti 2GB, or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690 3.5 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 equivalent or higher 
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
